page.title: 05The day of a farmer's son 2
page.content: From 8.30-4.30 I am in school slaving away and am glad to get home to work on the farm with my brother Paul and my Dad. When I have reached the gate to the farm I see (just over the bottom hedge) that they are planting brocoli. This is when I realize that I am needed."Quickly", says my Mum."You're needed on the planter". If it was any other job I wouldn't be in such a hurry to get to the field. But in this case I was in no mood for drinking coffee and eating biscuits. I quickly run up from the Court House and rush upstairs to get changed into my working clothes. It's then downstairs again to put on my working overall. In no time at all I'm out on the planter taking over from my Grandad who is ready to give up his place for younger hands.
